question: class SearchTextBasedWithAdditionalInfo: def __init__(self, other=None): pass class HasName: def get_name(self): raise NotImplementedError class OAuth2ClientRegistrationInfo(SearchTextBasedWithAdditionalInfo, HasName): def __init__(self, other=None): super().__init__(other) self.name = getattr(other, "name", None) def get_name(self): return self.name def get_search_text(self): return self.name
answer: public class OAuth2ClientRegistrationInfo extends SearchTextBasedWithAdditionalInfo<OAuth2ClientRegistrationInfoId> implements HasName { private String name; public OAuth2ClientRegistrationInfo(OAuth2ClientRegistrationInfo o){super(o);this.name=o.name;} @Override public String getName(){return name;} @Override public String getSearchText(){return name;} }

question: def test_last_message_dropped(unicast_class): setup(unicast_class) set_level("trace", a, b) dest = b.get_address() for i in range(1, 6): msg = Message(dest, i) if i == 5: discard.set_drop_down_unicasts(1) # drops the next unicast a.send(msg)
answer: public void testLastMessageDropped(Class<? extends Protocol> unicast_class) throws Exception { setup(unicast_class); setLevel("trace", a, b); Address dest=b.getAddress(); for(int i=1; i <= 5; i++) { Message msg=new Message(dest, i); if(i == 5) discard.setDropDownUnicasts(1); // drops the next unicast a.send(msg); }

question: class GX: def __init__(self, s): self.f4456b = int(s.split(",")[0]) self.f4457c = int(s.split(",")[1]) class MyClass: def __init__(self): self.f4244e = threading.RLock() self.f4244e_obj = type('F4244EObj', (), {})() self.f4245f = None self.f4241b = None def a(self): with self.f4244e: result_str = self.f4245f(None, self.f4241b.a()) gx_var = GX(str(result_str)) with self.f4244e: self.f4244e_obj.f6028e = int(gx_var.f4456b) self.f4244e_obj.d0 = int(gx_var.f4457c)
answer: public final void a() { synchronized (this.f4244e) { gx gxVar = new gx((String) this.f4245f.invoke(null, this.f4241b.a())); synchronized (this.f4244e) { this.f4244e.f6028e = Long.valueOf(gxVar.f4456b); this.f4244e.d0 = Long.valueOf(gxVar.f4457c); } } }

question: class WebServicesProperties: def __init__(self): self._path = None def set_path(self, path): if not path or len(path) < 1: raise ValueError("Path must have length greater than 1") self._path = path class TestWebServicesProperties(unittest.TestCase): def test_path_must_not_be_empty(self): properties = WebServicesProperties() with self.assertRaises(ValueError) as context: properties.set_path("") self.assertIn("Path must have length greater than 1", str(context.exception)) if __name__ == "__main__": unittest.main()
answer: public void pathMustNotBeEmpty() { this.properties = new WebServicesProperties(); this.thrown.expect(IllegalArgumentException.class); this.thrown.expectMessage("Path must have length greater than 1"); this.properties.setPath(""); }

question: class ShowCollectedJob(ParentJobClass): def __init__(self, show_id: int, is_collected: bool): super().__init__(show_id, 1 if is_collected else 0, JobAction.EPISODE_COLLECTION) self.is_collected = is_collected

question: class BioModel: def is_array(self, value: str) -> bool: return value.endswith("[]") def action_performed(event): selected = compart_box.get() if bio_model.is_array(selected): i_index.config(state="normal") else: i_index.delete(0, tk.END) i_index.config(state="disabled") root = tk.Tk() bio_model = BioModel() compart_box = ttk.Combobox(root, values=["int", "float[]", "string[]", "char"]) compart_box.pack() compart_box.bind("<<ComboboxSelected>>", action_performed) i_index = tk.Entry(root, state="disabled") i_index.pack() root.mainloop()
answer: public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) { if (e.getSource() == compartBox){ if (bioModel.isArray((String)compartBox.getSelectedItem())) { iIndex.setEnabled(true); } else { iIndex.setText(""); iIndex.setEnabled(false); } } }

question: class Str: ZERO = None def __init__(self, value: bytes): self.value = value @classmethod def get(cls, v: bytes): return cls.ZERO if len(v) == 0 else cls(v)
answer: public static Str get(final byte[] v) { return v.length == 0 ? ZERO : new Str(v); }

question: Request = TypeVar('Request') Response = TypeVar('Response') class HttpRequest: pass class RequestSender(ABC, Generic[Request, Response]): @abstractmethod def send(self, request: Request, http_request: HttpRequest) -> Response: """发送请求并返回响应""" pass
answer: public interface RequestSender<Request, Response> { Response send(Request request, HttpRequest httpRequest) throws IOException; }

question: class IntransativeEvent: def __init__(self, actor, action): self.actor = actor self.action = action class Weaver: def __init__(self): self.events = [] self.actors_or_groups = set() def add_actor_or_group(self, actor): self.actors_or_groups.add(actor) def record(self, actor, action): self.add_actor_or_group(actor) self.events.append(IntransativeEvent(actor, action)) return self
answer: public Weaver record(Actor actor, String action) { addActorOrGroup(actor); events.add(new IntransativeEvent(actor, action)); return this; }

question: class Actor: pass class Group(list): pass class Weaver: def __init__(self): self.actor_set = set() self.group_actors = set() def add_actor_or_group(self, actor): if isinstance(actor, Group): for a in actor: self.actor_set.discard(a) self.group_actors.add(a)
answer: private void addActorOrGroup(Actor actor) { if (actor instanceof Group) { for(Actor a : (Group) actor) { actorSet.remove(a); groupActors.add(a); } } }

question: class FairyTale: def __init__(self, actors, events): self.actors = actors self.events = events class Weaver: def __init__(self): self.actor_set = set() self.events = [] def weave(self): actors = list(self.actor_set) return FairyTale(actors, self.events)
answer: public Tale weave() { List<Actor> actors = new ArrayList<>(); actors.addAll(actorSet); return new FairyTale(actors, events); }

question: class EdcException(Exception): pass def read_keystore_from_resources(file_name: str, password: str): file_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), file_name) if not os.path.exists(file_path): raise EdcException(f"Resource not found: {file_name}") try: with open(file_path, "rb") as f: data = f.read() pkcs12_data = pkcs12.load_key_and_certificates(data, password.encode(), default_backend()) return pkcs12_data except Exception as e: raise EdcException(f"Failed to load keystore: {e}")
answer: private static KeyStore readKeystoreFromResources(String fileName, String type, String password) { var url = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader().getResource(fileName); Objects.requireNonNull(url); try { var ks = KeyStore.getInstance(type); var fis = new FileInputStream(url.getFile()); ks.load(fis, password.toCharArray()); return ks; } catch (Exception e) { throw new EdcException("Failed to load keystore: " + e); } }

question: def set_transparent_status_bar(window): window.fullscreen = True window.clearcolor = (0, 0, 0, 0)

question: class SchemaException(Exception): pass class ObjectNotFoundException(Exception): pass class CommunicationException(Exception): pass class ConfigurationException(Exception): pass class ExpressionEvaluationException(Exception): pass def apply_definition(shadow, task, parent_result): try: ctx = ctx_factory.create_for_shadow(shadow, task, parent_result) shadow_caretaker.apply_attributes_definition(ctx, shadow) except (SchemaException, ObjectNotFoundException, CommunicationException, ConfigurationException, ExpressionEvaluationException) as e: raise e
answer: public void applyDefinition(PrismObject<ShadowType> shadow, Task task, OperationResult parentResult) throws SchemaException, ObjectNotFoundException, CommunicationException, ConfigurationException, ExpressionEvaluationException { ProvisioningContext ctx = ctxFactory.createForShadow(shadow, task, parentResult); shadowCaretaker.applyAttributesDefinition(ctx, shadow); }

question: def get_optional_middleman_or_files(context, attribute, transition_mode="HOST"): return get_optional_middleman_or_files_full(context, attribute, transition_mode)

question: def get_optional_middleman_or_files(context, attribute, mode="HOST"): dep = context.get_prerequisite(attribute, mode) if dep is not None: return get_middleman_or_files(context, attribute, mode) else: return NestedSet.empty_set(order="STABLE_ORDER")
answer: private static NestedSet<Artifact> getOptionalMiddlemanOrFiles( RuleContext context, String attribute, TransitionMode mode) { TransitiveInfoCollection dep = context.getPrerequisite(attribute, mode); return dep != null ? getMiddlemanOrFiles(context, attribute, mode) : NestedSetBuilder.emptySet(Order.STABLE_ORDER); }

question: def get_client(user): if not local_oozie_active: raise RuntimeError("LocalOozie is not initialized") if not user: raise ValueError("user must not be empty") dag_engine = Services.get().get(DagEngineService).get_dag_engine(user, "undef") return LocalOozieClient(dag_engine)
answer: public static OozieClient getClient(String user) { if (!localOozieActive) { throw new IllegalStateException("LocalOozie is not initialized"); } ParamChecker.notEmpty(user, "user"); DagEngine dagEngine = Services.get().get(DagEngineService.class).getDagEngine(user, "undef"); return new LocalOozieClient(dagEngine); }

question: def read_int(application, buffer): if application.get_compression_setting().is_varint_compression(): return VarIntUtil.get_varint(buffer) if buffer.readable_bytes() < 4: raise VarIntUtil.FOUR_BYTES return buffer.read_int()
answer: public static int readInt(@AssumeNotNull ApplicationImpl application, @AssumeNotNull ByteBuf buffer) throws CancelReadSignal { if (application.getCompressionSetting().isVarIntCompression()) { return VarIntUtil.getVarInt(buffer); } if (buffer.readableBytes() < 4) { throw VarIntUtil.FOUR_BYTES; } return buffer.readInt(); }

question: def write_int_unchecked(application: ApplicationImpl, buffer: ByteBuf, value: int) -> None: if application.get_compression_setting().is_var_int_compression(): VarIntUtil.write_var_int(value, buffer) else: buffer.write_int(value)
answer: public static void writeIntUnchecked(@AssumeNotNull ApplicationImpl application, @AssumeNotNull ByteBuf buffer, int value) { if (application.getCompressionSetting().isVarIntCompression()) { VarIntUtil.writeVarInt(value, buffer); } else { buffer.writeInt(value); } }

question: def handle(user, message): send_message = TelegramUtils.create_message_template(user) advert = advert_service.save_advert(user, AdvertType.RENT) user.current_advert = advert.id user_repository.save(user) advert_service.set_advert_category(advert, message) send_message.text = Text.REQUEST_RENTING_OUT_NAME user.state = State.RENTING_SET_NAME user_repository.save(user) return [send_message]
answer: public List<PartialBotApiMethod<? extends Serializable>> handle(User user, String message) { SendMessage sendMessage = TelegramUtils.createMessageTemplate(user); Advert advert = advertService.saveAdvert(user, AdvertType.RENT); user.setCurrentAdvert(advert.getId()); userRepository.save(user); advertService.setAdvertCategory(advert, message); sendMessage.setText(Text.REQUEST_RENTING_OUT_NAME); user.setState(State.RENTING_SET_NAME); userRepository.save(user); return List.of(sendMessage); }

question: def is_known(self, word: int) -> bool: if self.rules_with_word is None: self.init_rules_with_word() return word < len(self.rules_with_word) and bool(self.rules_with_word[word])
answer: public boolean isKnown(int word) { if (rulesWithWord == null) { initRulesWithWord(); } return (word < rulesWithWord.length && ! rulesWithWord[word].isEmpty()); }

question: def is_known(self, word: str) -> bool: i_w = IntTaggedWord(self.word_numberer().number(word), self.null_tag) return self.seen_counter.get_count(i_w) > 0.0
answer: public boolean isKnown(String word) { IntTaggedWord iW = new IntTaggedWord(wordNumberer().number(word), nullTag); return seenCounter.getCount(iW) > 0.0; }

question: def prolog_and_epilog(prolog: bool): if not prolog: print("*************************", file=sys.stderr) print(file=sys.stderr) print(file=sys.stderr) if prolog: print("***********************", file=sys.stderr)
answer: private static void prologAndEpilog(boolean prolog) { if (!prolog) { System.err.println("*************************"); } System.err.println(); System.err.println(); if (prolog) { System.err.println("***********************"); } }

question: def boolean_to_string(input: bool) -> str: return "True" if input else "False"
answer: public static String booleanToString(boolean input) { return input ? "True" : "False"; }

question: def start_element(self, uri, local_name, q_name, attributes): tag = XMLFormat.StyleTag[q_name.lower()] if tag == XMLFormat.StyleTag.style: name = XMLFormat.style_get_name(attributes) if name is not None: self._e.name = name raise SAXException("Parsing finished")
answer: public void startElement(String uri, String localName, String qName, Attributes attributes) throws SAXException { XMLFormat.StyleTag tag = XMLFormat.StyleTag.valueOf(qName.toLowerCase()); switch (tag) { case style: String name = XMLFormat.styleGetName(attributes); if (name != null) { _e.name = name; } throw new SAXException("Parsing finished"); } }

question: class AuthenticationTokenSecretManager: def __init__(self, instance_id: str, token_max_lifetime: int): if instance_id is None: raise ValueError("instance_id must not be None") if token_max_lifetime <= 0: raise ValueError("Max lifetime must be positive") self.instance_id = instance_id self.token_max_lifetime = token_max_lifetime
answer: public AuthenticationTokenSecretManager(String instanceID, long tokenMaxLifetime) { requireNonNull(instanceID); checkArgument(tokenMaxLifetime > 0, "Max lifetime must be positive"); this.instanceID = instanceID; this.tokenMaxLifetime = tokenMaxLifetime; }

answer: public synchronized void removeAllKeys() { allKeys.clear(); currentKey = null; }

question: class SolrOrderings: def __init__(self): self._orders = [] def add_all(self, orders): self._orders.extend(orders) def get(self): return self._orders @staticmethod def merge(*orderings): merged = SolrOrderings() for o in orderings: merged.add_all(o.get()) return merged
answer: public static SolrOrderings merge(SolrOrderings... orderings) { SolrOrderings merged = new SolrOrderings(); for (SolrOrderings o : orderings) { merged.addAll(o.get()); } return merged; }

question: def __str__(self): return f"SolrOrderings [{self._orders}]"
answer: public String toString() { return "SolrOrderings [" + orderings + "]"; }

Enter something"); BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in)); String input = reader.readLine(); System.out.println("You typed: " + input); }

question: def on_options_item_selected(self, item): if item.id == "home": self.finish() return super().on_options_item_selected(item)
answer: public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item) { if (item.getItemId() == android.R.id.home) finish(); return super.onOptionsItemSelected(item); }

question: def get_gmt_time(self): current = datetime.now() current -= timedelta(hours=2) self.milliseconds = int(current.timestamp() * 1000) offset_seconds = time.localtime().tm_gmtoff if time.localtime().tm_isdst > 0: dst_offset = time.daylight * 3600 offset_seconds += dst_offset self.milliseconds -= offset_seconds * 1000
answer: private void getGMTTime() { mCurrent = Calendar.getInstance(); mCurrent.add(Calendar.HOUR, -2); mMiliSeconds = mCurrent.getTimeInMillis(); TimeZone tzCurrent = mCurrent.getTimeZone(); int offset = tzCurrent.getRawOffset(); if (tzCurrent.inDaylightTime(new Date())) { offset = offset + tzCurrent.getDSTSavings(); } mMiliSeconds = mMiliSeconds - offset; }

question: def body_has_unsupported_encoding(headers): content_encoding = headers.get("Content-Encoding") return (content_encoding is not None and content_encoding.lower() != "identity" and content_encoding.lower() != "gzip")
answer: private boolean bodyHasUnsupportedEncoding(Headers headers) { String contentEncoding = headers.get("Content-Encoding"); return contentEncoding != null && !contentEncoding.equalsIgnoreCase("identity") && !contentEncoding.equalsIgnoreCase("gzip"); }

question: def get_native_source(input_stream, is_gzipped): if is_gzipped: return io.BufferedReader(gzip.GzipFile(fileobj=input_stream)) else: return input_stream
answer: private BufferedSource getNativeSource(BufferedSource input, boolean isGzipped) { if (isGzipped) { GzipSource source = new GzipSource(input); return Okio.buffer(source); } else { return input; } }

question: def resolve_class(self, clazz: Type) -> Optional[Type]: if not issubclass(clazz, BaseDualDatabaseService): return None generics = get_args(clazz) if not generics: return None elif len(generics) == 1: return generics[0] else: return generics[0]
answer: private Class<T> resolveClass(Class<?> clazz) { ResolvableType resolvableType = ResolvableType.forClass(clazz).as(BaseDualDatabaseService.class); if (!resolvableType.hasGenerics()) { return null; } if(resolvableType.getGenerics().length == 1) { return (Class<T>) resolvableType.getGeneric().resolve(); } else { return (Class<T>) resolvableType.getGenerics()[0].resolve(); } }

question: def rect_disjoint(a_min_lat, a_max_lat, a_min_lon, a_max_lon, b_min_lat, b_max_lat, b_min_lon, b_max_lon) -> bool: return (a_max_lon < b_min_lon or a_min_lon > b_max_lon or a_max_lat < b_min_lat or a_min_lat > b_max_lat)
answer: private static boolean rectDisjoint( final double aMinLat, final double aMaxLat, final double aMinLon, final double aMaxLon, final double bMinLat, final double bMaxLat, final double bMinLon, final double bMaxLon) { return (aMaxLon < bMinLon || aMinLon > bMaxLon || aMaxLat < bMinLat || aMinLat > bMaxLat); }

question: def rect_crosses(a_min_lat, a_max_lat, a_min_lon, a_max_lon, b_min_lat, b_max_lat, b_min_lon, b_max_lon) -> bool: return not (rect_disjoint(a_min_lat, a_max_lat, a_min_lon, a_max_lon, b_min_lat, b_max_lat, b_min_lon, b_max_lon) or rect_within(a_min_lat, a_max_lat, a_min_lon, a_max_lon, b_min_lat, b_max_lat, b_min_lon, b_max_lon))
answer: public static boolean rectCrosses( final double aMinLat, final double aMaxLat, final double aMinLon, final double aMaxLon, final double bMinLat, final double bMaxLat, final double bMinLon, final double bMaxLon) { return !(rectDisjoint(aMinLat, aMaxLat, aMinLon, aMaxLon, bMinLat, bMaxLat, bMinLon, bMaxLon) || rectWithin(aMinLat, aMaxLat, aMinLon, aMaxLon, bMinLat, bMaxLat, bMinLon, bMaxLon)); }

question: def test_byte_static_field_value(self): try: self.init() value = self.eval(f"EvalTypeTests.{self.xStaticFieldByte}") type_name = value.get_reference_type_name() assert type_name == "byte", f"byte field value : wrong type : {type_name}" byte_value = value.get_byte_value() assert byte_value == self.xStaticFieldByteValue, f"byte field value : wrong result : {byte_value}" value = self.eval(f"EvalTypeTests.{self.yStaticFieldByte}") type_name = value.get_reference_type_name() assert type_name == "byte", f"byte field value : wrong type : {type_name}" byte_value = value.get_byte_value() assert byte_value == self.yStaticFieldByteValue, f"byte field value : wrong result : {byte_value}" finally: self.end()
answer: public void testByteStaticFieldValue() throws Throwable { try { init(); IValue value = eval("EvalTypeTests." + xStaticFieldByte); String typeName = value.getReferenceTypeName(); assertEquals("byte field value : wrong type : ", "byte", typeName); byte byteValue = ((IJavaPrimitiveValue) value).getByteValue(); assertEquals("byte field value : wrong result : ", xStaticFieldByteValue, byteValue); value = eval("EvalTypeTests." + yStaticFieldByte); typeName = value.getReferenceTypeName(); assertEquals("byte field value : wrong type : ", "byte", typeName); byteValue = ((IJavaPrimitiveValue) value).getByteValue(); assertEquals("byte field value : wrong result : ", yStaticFieldByteValue, byteValue); } finally { end(); } }

question: def reinit_rounds(self): self.jjround = 0x80000001 self.jjrounds = [0x80000000 for _ in range(109)]
answer: private void ReInitRounds() { int i; jjround = 0x80000001; for (i = 109; i-- > 0;) jjrounds[i] = 0x80000000; }

question: def switch_to(self, lex_state: int): if lex_state >= 1 or lex_state < 0: raise TokenMgrError(f"Error: Ignoring invalid lexical state : {lex_state}. State unchanged.", TokenMgrError.INVALID_LEXICAL_STATE) else: self.cur_lex_state = lex_state
answer: public void SwitchTo(int lexState) { if (lexState >= 1 || lexState < 0) throw new TokenMgrError("Error: Ignoring invalid lexical state : " + lexState + ". State unchanged.", TokenMgrError.INVALID_LEXICAL_STATE); else curLexState = lexState; }

question: def jj_check_n_add_states(self, start: int, end: int): while True: self.jj_check_n_add(self.jjnext_states[start]) if start == end: break start += 1
answer: private void jjCheckNAddStates(int start, int end) { do { jjCheckNAdd(jjnextStates[start]); } while (start++ != end); }

question: def jj_check_n_add(self, state: int): if self.jjrounds[state] != self.jjround: self.jjstate_set[self.jjnew_state_cnt] = state self.jjnew_state_cnt += 1 self.jjrounds[state] = self.jjround
answer: private void jjCheckNAdd(int state) { if (jjrounds[state] != jjround) { jjstateSet[jjnewStateCnt++] = state; jjrounds[state] = jjround; } }

question: def relax(e: DirectedEdge) -> None: v = e.from_() w = e.to() if dist_to[w] > dist_to[v] + e.weight(): dist_to[w] = dist_to[v] + e.weight() edge_to[w] = e if w in pq: pq.change(w, dist_to[w]) else: pq.insert(w, dist_to[w])
answer: private void relax(DirectedEdge e) { int v = e.from(); int w = e.to(); if (distTo[w] > distTo[v] + e.weight()) { distTo[w] = distTo[v] + e.weight(); edgeTo[w] = e; if (pq.contains(w)) { pq.change(w, distTo[w]); } else { pq.insert(w, distTo[w]); } } }

question: def path_to(self, v): if not self.has_path_to(v): return None path = [] e = self.edge_to[v] while e is not None: path.append(e) e = self.edge_to[e.from_()] path.reverse() return path
answer: public Iterable<DirectedEdge> pathTo(int v) { if (!hasPathTo(v)) return null; Stack<DirectedEdge> path = new Stack<>(); for (DirectedEdge e = edgeTo[v]; e != null; e = edgeTo[e.from()]) path.push(e); return path; }

question: def pre_handle(request, response, handler): if logger.is_debug_enabled(): begin_time = int(datetime.now().timestamp() * 1000) start_time_thread_local.set(begin_time) logger.debug( "开始计时: {} URI: {}".format( datetime.fromtimestamp(begin_time / 1000).strftime("%I:%M:%S.%f")[:-3], request.get_request_uri() ) ) return True
answer: public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler) throws Exception { if (logger.isDebugEnabled()) { long beginTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); startTimeThreadLocal.set(beginTime); logger.debug("开始计时: {} URI: {}", new SimpleDateFormat("hh:mm:ss.SSS").format(beginTime), request.getRequestURI()); } return true; }

question: def install_cell_info(self, child, editor_cell): if (editor_cell.get_substitute_info() is None or isinstance(editor_cell.get_substitute_info(), DefaultSubstituteInfo)): editor_cell.set_substitute_info( OldNewCompositeSubstituteInfo( self.my_editor_context, SChildSubstituteInfo( editor_cell, self.my_owner_node, MetaAdapterFactory.get_containment_link( 0x5f522167449a4486, 0x94654f30de6e5cec, 0x70aadf795f70b1, 0x70aadf795f73d4, "Member_name_1" ), child ), DefaultChildSubstituteInfo( self.my_owner_node, self.my_containment_link.get_declaration_node(), self.my_editor_context ) ) ) if editor_cell.get_role() is None: editor_cell.set_role("Member_name_1")

question: def apply_recurrent_effect(self, blob): blob.damage = blob.damage - AGGRESSIVE_DAMAGE_DECREMENT if blob.damage <= self.source_initial_damage: blob.damage = self.source_initial_damage
answer: public void applyRecurrentEffect(Blob blob) { blob.setDamage(blob.getDamage() - AGGRESSIVE_DAMAGE_DECREMENT); if (blob.getDamage() <= this.sourceInitialDamage) { blob.setDamage(this.sourceInitialDamage); } }
